unnormalised: Campus hiring remains crucial for talent acquisition in India. Institutions like IIT Delhi provide excellent candidates. Careful screening, akin to finding the perfect role in "3 Idiots," is vital. Consider internship programs, offering stipends starting from Rs. 20,000 per month. Focus on candidates within a 50 km radius of the Mumbai office. A well-structured program reduces attrition. We saw increased applications post-Diwali, indicating heightened interest.
